user_query: My company is organizing a business trip to Tokyo, Japan. We need a detailed 5-day trip plan that includes important landmarks and attractions. Also, provide flight options from London, UK to Tokyo.

TaskList.description: Research and select flight options from London, UK to Tokyo.
Compile a list of important landmarks and attractions in Tokyo.
Create a detailed 5-day itinerary incorporating selected landmarks and attractions.
Organize the completed itinerary and flight options into a comprehensive travel plan document.
